Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show a string telephone connecting two students, illustrating the concept of communicating over a distance.
The student can depict how the string telephone uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can demonstrate the use of provided materials in constructing the string telephone device.
The student can include features of the string telephone that show it effectively communicates over a distance.
The student can illustrate how this device helps people communicate when they are far apart.
